meta.title: Why I don't like module mocks, kinda.
meta.description: I think requiring module mocks to test your code suggests a code smell. However, they can be a powerful tool for an existing codebase.
meta.twitter:title: Why I don't like module mocks, kinda.
meta.twitter:description: I think requiring module mocks to test your code suggests a code smell. However, they can be a powerful tool for an existing codebase.
